channel.title: How do i raise or lvl the skills max lvl and combat max lvl?
channel.description: sry for such a noob question, if you can just tell me what file that is in and i think i can figure it out myself

item.title: How do i raise or lvl the skills max lvl and combat max lvl?
item.dc:creator: @Evade Evade
item.description:
@Evade wrote:

For the skills max level, open your client.java and search "return " then what ever the max level is already, and change it for example if it was “return 135”, you should change it to “return 200” or something and there should be another 135 above that, change that to 200 or whatever you want the max to be aswell.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i raise or lvl the skills max lvl and combat max lvl?
